item.title: You Won't Believe What Happened When She Gave Him That Rose!
item.description: I. Introduction We all know the old saying, “A rose by any other name would smell as sweet,” but what happens when you give a rose to someone special? This story will show you just how powerful a single rose can be. II. What Happened? Once upon a time, there was a young man who had been in love with a woman for years. He had never been able to find the courage to tell her how he felt, so he decided to give her a rose as a token of his love.
